function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in site offices and vans","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission among on-site workers","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and provide adequate ventilation in site offices and vans","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote temperature screening, and air quality monitoring systems","People":"On-site workers, construction staff","Owner":"Management within organisations"},{"Description":"Increased use of technology and mobile phones for remote work","Impact":"Dependency on technology for communication and collaboration increases the risk of cyber threats and data breaches","Mitigation":"Implement cybersecurity measures, provide employee training on data security best practices","Technologies":"Endpoint security solutions, secure communication tools, and VPNs","People":"Senior staff members, remote workers","Owner":"IT department, cybersecurity team"},{"Description":"Challenges in supply chain and accommodation provision for construction workers","Impact":"Disruption of construction projects due to lack of materials and accommodation for workers","Mitigation":"Explore alternative supply chain options, provide temporary housing facilities for workers","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, inventory tracking systems, and project management tools","People":"Supply chain staff, construction workers","Owner":"Supply chain managers, Project management team"}]}
